SubActionArguments.FrameTitle: Step 16 - Compare the base64 decoded Identifiers
SubActionArguments.InputKeyName: the base64 decoded Identifier values from the transactions.
SubActionArguments.InputValue: [{"title": "Identifiers from the Main transaction and prrofHash transaction", "t1": "${MainTXNCurentTXNDataIdentifierDecoded}", "t2": "${MainTXNProofHashDataIdentifierDecoded}"}]

SubActionArguments.FrameTitle: Step 17 - Compare the base64 decoded Source Accounts
SubActionArguments.InputKeyName: the base64 decoded Source Accounts from the transactions.
SubActionArguments.InputValue: [{"title": "Source Account from the Main transaction and proofHash transaction", "t1": "${MainTXNCurentTXNDataSourceAccount}", "t2": "${MainTXNProofHashDataSourceAccount}"}]

SubActionArguments.FrameTitle: Step 18 - Compare the base64 decoded Destination Accounts
SubActionArguments.InputKeyName: the base64 decoded Destination values from the transactions.
SubActionArguments.InputValue: [{"title": "Destination Accounts from the Main transaction and proofHash transaction", "t1": "${MainTXNCurentTXNDataDestinationAccount}", "t2": "${MainTXNProofHashDataDestinationAccountDecoded}"}]

SubActionArguments.FrameTitle: Step 19 - Compare the base64 decoded Assets
SubActionArguments.InputKeyName: the base64 decoded Asset values from the transactions.
SubActionArguments.InputValue: [{"title": "Assets from the Main transaction and proofHash transaction", "t1": "${MainTXNCurentTXNDataAssetCode}", "t2": "${MainTXNProofHashDataAssetCodeDecoded}"}]

SubActionArguments.FrameTitle: Step 20 - Compare the base64 decoded Asset Amount
SubActionArguments.InputKeyName: the base64 decoded Asset Amount values from the transactions.
SubActionArguments.InputValue: [{"title": "Asset Amount from the Main transaction and proofHash transaction", "t1": "${MainTXNCurentTXNDataAssetAmount}", "t2": "${MainTXNProofHashDataAssetAmountDecoded}"}]
